attributes.action: Stop abusing immigrants and talk about the positives e.g work in  the NHS, DSS
attributes.background: Political figures are abusing immigrants during every electoral cycle through negative talk and down right lies.Immigrants have immensely  contributed  to the Uk economy and are a backbone in the NHS and DSS . With UK staff shortages, immigrants have kept these departments going.

rejection.details:
Parliament has made a large number of extremely positive and supportive statements about immigration and about EU citizens resident in the UK. You can read these online in Hansard - the official written record of parliamentary proceedings. For example, this debate happened on 12 July:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2016-07-12/debates/16071252000002/EUCitizensResidentInTheUnitedKingdom(RightToStay)
